original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 835: Board Member B
original_content:
This week Jonathan and Rob chat with Nate Graham about KDE! Why did Nate walk away from Apple, and how did he find Linux and KDE? And what does he see coming next? Watch to find out!


https://invent.kde.org/ngraham
https://pointieststick.com
https://techpaladinsoftware.com


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.
Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - Nate Grahamが語るKDEとLinuxへの道のり
body: 今週のポッドキャストで、Nate GrahamがKDEについて語る。Appleを辞めた理由やLinuxとの出会い、今後の展望を共有。
titles: - Nate Grahamが語るKDEとLinuxへの道のり
- Appleを離れた理由とKDEの未来
- JonathanとRobが届けるFLOSS Weeklyポッドキャスト
- Nate Grahamとのインタビュー収録の見どころ
- YouTubeでのライブ録画をお見逃しなく！
